Life is Like Slalom Waterskiing on Crowe Lake: Ontario Lakes Project

01 Feb 2013


Forest Gump might think that “life is like a box of chocolates” but lately around our house, we’ve been talking about how life is like a waterslide–intense, thrilling, scary, fun. It’s a ride where you never know what’s around the corner, but that’s the whole idea.

This great Slalom-cam video of shot on Crowe Lake in the Kawarthas makes me think that life is also a lot like slalom waterskiing on Crowe lake. If you’re anything like me, waterskiing (on two skis never mind one) is both exhilarating and terrifying. If you do it on one ski, it’s all those things to the power of ten.

Watching this video makes my stomach muscles tense up and puts a smile on my face. Feels like how most of my days go down. What does it do for you? Is life like slalom waterskiing? a waterslide? a box of chocolates? a colonoscopy?
